channel.title: Range Method
channel.description:
Does anyone have a method that will make the arrows go to the player when fired?..
Cause when i use createProjectile, only the person shooting can see the arrow..
When i use a different method. The person shooting, and the oponent can see the arrow, but the arrow flies in differ directions, even when im using AttackingOn + 1...

item.title: Range Method

item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Does anyone have a method that will make the arrows go to the player when fired?..

Cause when i use createProjectile, only the person shooting can see the arrow…
